QueryResult.text: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT count(*) FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES V, CMN_OPTIONS O WHERE V.OPTION_ID = O.ID AND O.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND O.OPTION_CODE = 'PRJ_EFFORT_DISP_UNIT' AND V.VALUE = 'days') > 0 THEN (SELECT nvl(c.HOURS_PER_DAY,1) HOURS_PER_DAY FROM PRSITE s, PRCALENDAR c WHERE s.prCalendarID = c.prid(+)) ELSE 1 END hours_per_day from dual
